Name: Cipango
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE without ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Swiss Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Simon Brandmayer at ONYX Bar in  Zürich.
Nutrition: One serving of Cipango contains 210 calories
